title: Add game instructions and enhance Japanese/Korean game aesthetic

requirements.summary: Create comprehensive tutorial/onboarding system explaining game mechanics
acceptanceCriteria: Tutorial system is accessible from the main game home page
Instructions explain the character unlock system clearly
Riddle challenge mechanics are explained with examples
Progress tracking system is documented for users
Tutorial can be accessed at any time during gameplay

file_operations.description: Create a comprehensive tutorial modal component with multi-step walkthrough explaining character unlocking, riddle challenges, story viewing, and progress tracking. Include the generated tutorial icon asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/tutorial-icon.dim_128x128.png. Use anime-styled design with polished visual effects matching Japanese/Korean game standards.
Add tutorial button to the hero section that opens the TutorialModal component. Position prominently with clear visual hierarchy and anime-style hover effects.
Add a help/tutorial icon button in the navigation header that opens the TutorialModal, ensuring tutorial is accessible from any page during gameplay.

requirements.summary: Redesign UI with enhanced Japanese/Korean game aesthetic featuring polished anime-style visual effects and modern gradients
acceptanceCriteria: UI features polished anime-style visual effects and transitions
Typography hierarchy is clear and professional with appropriate font weights and sizes
Color gradients and schemes match modern Japanese/Korean mobile game standards
Spacing and layout composition meet professional game UI standards
All text remains in English language
Overall aesthetic quality significantly improved from current state

file_operations.description: Enhance global styles with refined Japanese/Korean game aesthetic: improve OKLCH color palette with richer gradients, add professional-grade animations and transitions, refine typography hierarchy with better font weights and letter spacing. Add CSS custom properties for premium visual effects like glows, shimmers, and particle overlays.

Extend Tailwind configuration with modern gradient schemes common in Asian mobile games, enhanced shadow utilities for depth, refined animation timings for smooth polished effects, and professional spacing scale.

Redesign the layout component with enhanced visual effects: add polished anime-style gradients to header/footer, improve navigation typography hierarchy, add smooth transitions, and refine spacing for professional composition.

Enhance the roster page with improved visual hierarchy, refined typography for header and title, polished anime-style background effects, and professional spacing that matches Japanese/Korean game UI standards.
Redesign character detail page with enhanced anime-style visual effects, improved typography hierarchy for character information, refined color gradients, and professional layout composition.

requirements.summary: Add visual indicators and tooltips to guide users on interactive elements and game progression
acceptanceCriteria: Interactive elements have clear hover states and visual feedback
Tooltips explain what actions users can take on each screen
Progress indicators show clear paths to unlock characters
Visual cues highlight important game mechanics and features
First-time users can understand available actions without external documentation

file_operations.description: Create a reusable Tooltip component with anime-styled design for displaying contextual help and guidance throughout the interface. Include smooth fade-in animations and polished visual styling.

Add clear hover states with visual feedback, tooltips explaining locked/unlocked states and how to unlock characters, and visual indicators for interactive elements. Ensure first-time users understand they can click cards to view details or attempt riddles.
Add tooltips explaining the progress tracking system, visual indicators showing paths to unlock more characters, and enhanced hover states that guide users on their collection journey.
Add visual cues and tooltips explaining how riddle challenges work, what happens on correct/incorrect answers, and clear interactive feedback for the input field and submit button.

Add tooltips and visual indicators to navigation cards, authentication prompts, and key features. Include clear hover states and guidance for first-time users on what actions are available and how to begin their journey.

requirements.summary: Enhance character cards with polished anime-style visual effects including particle effects and premium borders
acceptanceCriteria: Character cards feature particle effects or animated elements
Premium-looking card borders and frames are implemented
Hover states include dynamic glow or shine effects
Locked and unlocked states have distinct premium visual treatments
Overall card design quality matches Japanese/Korean mobile game standards

file_operations.description: Transform character cards with premium anime-style effects: integrate particle effects using the generated sparkle sprite sheet at frontend/public/assets/generated/sparkle-particles.dim_256x256.png, apply the premium card border frame at frontend/public/assets/generated/card-border-premium.dim_400x500.png, add dynamic glow and shine hover animations, implement distinct visual treatments for locked vs unlocked states with premium quality matching Japanese/Korean mobile games.
Create a custom hook for managing particle effect animations on character cards, handling sprite sheet rendering and animation timing for polished visual effects.

requirements.summary: Improve home page layout with engaging hero section and clearer calls-to-action
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section is visually engaging with clear primary action
Visual hierarchy clearly distinguishes primary, secondary, and tertiary content
New users understand what to do first when landing on the page
Navigation paths to key features are immediately obvious
Overall layout follows Japanese/Korean game UI conventions

file_operations.description: Redesign the home page with an enhanced hero section using the generated hero banner asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner-enhanced.dim_1920x600.png featuring dynamic anime-style gradients and light effects. Improve visual hierarchy with clear distinction between primary (start playing), secondary (view roster), and tertiary actions. Add prominent calls-to-action that guide new users through first interactions. Ensure navigation paths to key features are immediately obvious following Japanese/Korean game UI conventions.
